reviews.name: Hong Nguyen
reviews.review:
Coming to the Mekong Delta without stopping at Ninh Kieu wharf would probably be a mistake.
The feeling of sailing on the vast river really makes us satisfied.  Beautiful ‚Ä¶

reviews.name: Arun Jayaprakash
reviews.review: Visited the marina to take a boat on our way to the Cai Rang Floating Market. The place is neat and well maintained, with beautiful gardens, plants and trees, and is a nice place to spend time with a view of the river.

reviews.name: H√† Vi·ªát Th·∫Øng
reviews.review: It‚Äôs new year so there are so much lights. Very cool, very demure

reviews.name: Ko Koo
reviews.review:
The floating market tour was okay... not really impressive.
If you don't have time in C·∫ßn Th∆°, you can easily pass on this tour. Typical tourist trap. ‚Ä¶

reviews.name: Tomas Hendrych
reviews.review: Be sure what you expect. There is almost no floating market any more, there are tourist floating souvenir market. We paid for private boat, had to wait 30 minutes abd finaly ended with 10 other tourist.

reviews.name: Natalia T
reviews.review: We rented a small boat for two people at 400,000 VND, which I found to be a reasonable price. Larger boats cost 100,000 VND per person and carry up to 20 people, but I don‚Äôt think they‚Äôre worth it. To get a good deal, arrive at the port by ‚Ä¶

reviews.name: David Henderson
reviews.review: A nice area to walk through, but kind of a bummer being constantly accosted by people trying to sell you boat tickets. ‚Ä¶

reviews.name: J C
reviews.review: The highlight of this warfare was supposed to be the boat dining experience. Sadly, the ride was short of good, and the food was mediocre at best. ‚Ä¶

reviews.name: C CLARENCE
reviews.review: Fun place to visit lot's of nice restaurant's and Bar's around. The floating market isn't much existing as I expected. Looks like it doesn't active as it used to be. But anyway you can experience what it's looks like Vietnamese culture

reviews.name: Nguyen Thanh Tam
reviews.review:
Touristic site with lots of restaurants, buildings and shops, so not spacious enough for those who like walking.
This is also a boat dock to visit the floating markets and the island so many ‚Ä¶

reviews.name: Eric Christophe
reviews.review: Great place with garden, as a ship docking there local authorities are not very complaisant or helpful, for our guests to embark the Sampan. Can tho is a busy town with its floating market CAI RANG therefore it can be very noisy for the guests sleeping and karaoke going on late at night.

reviews.name: Dr. Stephen Bui
reviews.review: Really nice place to walk by the pier with lots of restaurants and coffee shops. The place is beautiful and made to accommodate pedestrians. Lots of restaurants on the river as well. You would have a wonderful time there for dinner and after.

reviews.name: Darren Bird
reviews.review: I truly love this place. Day or night it is spectacular. A wonderful open place for walking. All sorts of food for sale. And a bridge for lovers. Young or old you will be enamored by this place. 5 stars.

reviews.name: Thu L∆∞u
reviews.review:
I went on Saturday, the led lights are turned off, so, I can not see many things in there.
I came in October during flood season, so the streets are drowned. ‚Ä¶

reviews.name: Olivine Thuy Phan
reviews.review: So nice, the atmosphere so nice in the morning, location veru friendly

reviews.name: Jeff Byron
reviews.review: Quick little ferry to get across the river. Costs  4000 per person for a return trip.

reviews.name: Tu Nguyen
reviews.review: Pure Air with view, you can see Can Tho River, Hau River. You also can see Can Tho Bridge. Clean and many people visit there in the evening. But sometimes Some people ask you want to go Cai Rang Floating Market by their boats, I thought ‚Ä¶

reviews.review: "Ninh Kieu Wharf" is one of the most famous symbols of Can Tho City and is also a cultural symbol of the Southwest region. The  floated market usually begins at dawn, which is very bustling and crowded. They mainly sell fruits for the ‚Ä¶

reviews.name: Dan Nguyen
reviews.review: The city improved this place quite a bit.  I love how you take a long walk along the river.  It is dimly lit in some area,  but brighly lit in the tourist area.  There are several boats serving dinner cruise at night.  You can order food, ‚Ä¶

reviews.review:
